channel.title: Docker.com on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Docker.com on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Docker at Microsoft Build 2025: Where Secure Software Meets Intelligent Innovation
item.description: This year at Microsoft Build, Docker will blend developer experience, security, and AI innovation with our latest product announcements. Whether you attend in person at the Seattle Convention Center or tune in online, you’ll see how Docker is redefining the way teams build, secure, and scale modern applications. Docker’s Vision for Developers At Microsoft Build... Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/docker-at-microsoft-build-2025/
